content: this pattern was inspired by a need to organize an entryway where everything seems to get dropped off and piled up the hanging nest basket pattern will help you create a hanging basket that is perfect for holding sunglasses gloves chap-stick and all those other things that struggle to find a home within your home made with 100% cotton yarn it hangs nicely off a hook adding function and beauty to your space this pattern also features a two-handled modification for a desktop basket or a fun way to dress up a potted plant i would love to see your finished projects post a picture here or tag me on instagram @amandacorvellodesigns **what you will need ** 1 ball of 100% cotton yarn approx 120yrds crochet hook size h8 5 0mm tapestry needle scissors **stitches used ** st- stitch chain- chain slip_stitch- slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease- single_crochet single_crochet decrease half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase- half_double_crochet half_double_crochet increase double_crochet- double_crochet fpdc- front post double_crochet bpdc- back post double_crochet
